title: Gift an Apple lover the ability to manage content across multiple iOS devices for only $20
content:
Macworld

Stumped on what to get an Apple lover this Christmas? Gift them a tool that helps them manage data and content across their Apple ecosystem: AnyTrans®!

This all-in-one manager for iPhone, iPad, iPod, iTunes, and iCloud content is now on sale for only $19.97 (reg. $79) through December 25. Since it’s a digital gift, you don’t need to worry about it arriving on time.

With AnyTrans® (4.8-star rated!), users can effortlessly maneuver all their digital content between their Apple devices and accounts. Whether your giftee is backing up files, upgrading to the new iPhone 15, or transitioning from an Android-based device, AnyTrans® moves and saves everything with a single click. That covers everything from photos, videos, iMessages, Safari histories, voice memos, and even WhatsApp chats and attachments.

Users can even enjoy one-click transfers of non-purchased music if they’re upgrading from an older iPhone to the new iPhone 15, as well as versatile restoration options, including full or selective restoration, multiple backup resources, etc.

Gift an Apple user easier data and content management across iOS devices and accounts with lifetime access to AnyTrans®, now just $19.97 through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is required to score this best-of-web pricing!
